mapper.select: SELECT spid_id , spid_dept , spid_name , spid_tel1 , spid_tel2 , spid_email , job FROM sender WHERE spid_name = #{senderName}
SELECT vender_id , vender_name , spid_id FROM vender WHERE spid_id = #{senderId}

SELECT tool.tool_id , tool_name , tool_model_number , tool_license , tool_details , vender_id , price_id , eur , exchange_rate , krw , quantity FROM tool LEFT OUTER JOIN price ON tool.tool_id = price.tool_id WHERE vender_id = #{venderId}
SELECT price_id , eur , exchange_rate , krw , tool_id , quantity FROM price WHERE tool_id = #{toolId} ORDER BY quantity ASC

SELECT customer_id , customer_company , customer_name , customer_tel , customer_email FROM customer
WHERE customer_company LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%') OR customer_name LIKE CONCAT('%', #{search}, '%')
